background.description: background color of the revision box

bomarkdown.defs.description: SVG def includes in each rendition
bomarkdown.defs.default:
<!-- Defs  here are necessary for rendition -->
<marker
  id="arrow"
  refX="6"
  refY="3"
  markerWidth="6"
  markerHeight="6"
  orient="auto-start-reverse">
  <path d="M 0 0 L 6 3 L 0 6 z" fill="steelblue"/>
</marker>
<g id="undef">
<rect x="0" y="0" width="18" height="18" fill="red" rx="4"/>
<text font-family="system-ui" dominant-baseline="middle" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bolder" font-style="normal" font-size="16" x="10" y="11" fill="white" >
?  
</text>
</g>



<g id="eff">

</g>

<!-- Defs  are Bubble definition must be consistent with Bubbles list 
Position are relatives to an item the zero of an item is the top left of its icon 
-->

<g id="matrice">
  <polyline fill="none" stroke="steelblue"  points="-5,17 -5,12" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <polyline fill="none" stroke="steelblue"  points="-5,17 0,17" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <polyline fill="none" stroke="steelblue"  points="-5,17 -7.5,19.5" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</g>

<g id="context">
  <circle r="4" cx="17" cy="17" fill="royalblue" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.25" />
</g>
<g id="lock" >
  <rect x="13" y="-2" width="8" height="8" fill="indigo" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.25"/>
  <path d="M 14 -2 A 3 3, 0,1,1,20 -2" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke="indigo" />
</g>
<g id="unlock" >
  <rect x="13" y="-2" width="8" height="8" fill="indigo" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.25" />
  <path d="M 14 -2 A 3 3, 0,1,0,8 -2" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke="indigo" />
</g>
<g id="noway">
  <circle r="7" cx="20" cy="0" fill="red" stroke="white" stroke-width="0.25"/>
  <line x1="16" y1="0" x2="24" y2="0" stroke="white" stroke-width="2.5"/>
</g>

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
